A few minutes digging found that the plugin is called Sangam. Sourceforge:
http://sangam.sourceforge.net/ and
http://www.industriallogic.com/software/sangam.html. It appears to have been
a collaboration of Industrial Logic and NC State university. A quick glance
suggests the code was last edited in 2004. Still if it works who cares.

Any one care to take a try?

Cheers
Mark
